title: Twin Method - The Volume Of Self [2006] [Metal] [DB]
description:
Twin Method is an Industrial-influenced Nu metal band from Liverpool, England.

It was announced that the band signed with Crash Music Inc. on February 3, 2006.[1] Their debut album The Volume of Self was released on June 13, 2006, and produced by ex-Machine Head/Soulfly guitarist Logan Mader. The music video for the album&#039;s lead single, "The Abrasive", was directed by Danny Roew in Los Angeles.

Twin Method has toured with such artists as Drowning Pool on their 2006 US tour, and American Head Charge on their 2006 European Occupation Tour. They will be featured on the 2007 edition of the Family Values Tour.They Will Be On The 2nd Stage With Five Finger Death Punch And Bloodsimple.

Also in 2007, Twin Method joined the bands Type O Negative and Lordi on their Halloween Tour. They are currently in the studio recording a new album, tentatively due in summer 2008.
